title: LivePerson: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
snippet: NEW YORK (AP) — NEW YORK (AP) — LivePerson Inc. (LPSN) on Monday reported a loss of $15.7 million in its second quarter. On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had a loss of 17 cents. Losses, adjusted for stock option expense and non-recurring costs, came to 11 cents per share.

title: LivePerson Inc (LPSN) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strategic Partnerships and AI Adoption ...
snippet: Despite a downward revision in full-year revenue guidance, LivePerson Inc (LPSN) reports strong AI adoption and strategic partnerships, enhancing its platform capabilities and market presence.

title: LivePerson (LPSN) Reports Q2 Loss, Beats Revenue Estimates
snippet: LivePerson (LPSN) came out with a quarterly loss of $0.11 per share versus the Zacks Consensus Estimate of a loss of $0.2. This compares to a loss of $0.69 per share a year ago. These figures are adjusted for non-recurring items.

title: LivePerson's Earnings Outlook
snippet: Analysts anticipate LivePerson to report an earnings per share (EPS) of $-0.21. Investors in LivePerson are eagerly awaiting the company's announcement, hoping for news of surpassing estimates and positive guidance for the next quarter.
